title: One Pot Broccoli and 3 Cheese Pasta – Edible Crafts
directions: Put pasta, garlic, lemon zest, goat's cheese, cheddar, mascarpone, cream, water and olive oil into a large pot over high heat. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium, and add broccoli and peas. Season lightly with salt and pepper and chili flakes if using. Cook for 10 minutes or until pasta is al dente and sauce is reduced* (sauce will continue to reduce as pot cools).
ingredients: 250 grams / 1/2 lbs orecchiette, or other short pasta
1/2 lemon, zest only (finely zest with a grater or microplane)
250 grams broccoli, cut into florets and small pieces (if using the stem peel and cut into very small pieces, no larger than 10 cm)
1 cup peas, fresh, frozen or canned
